snippet: Among the Group of 7 industrialized countries, only the Canadian, United States and German economies are now larger than they were at their prerecession peaks. The top set of charts shows the seven G-7 countries, ranked by performance since each...
lead_paragraph: Among the Group of 7 industrialized countries, only the Canadian, United States and German economies are now larger than they were at their prerecession peaks. The top set of charts shows the seven G-7 countries, ranked by performance since each economy peaked in 2007 or 2008, with members of the euro zone in italics. The second set shows the performance of seven other euro zone countries, similarly ranked.
